game.name: CONDEMNED: Nightfall
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A survival horror PvE and PvP set in a Noir Futuristic NYC! Team up with up to two others, or go in alone, and search creature-filled semi open-world map for arcane clues that lead you to a lucrative Bounty. Featuring permadeath consequences, only the best hunters will make it out alive..
